alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lincoln County through 545 PM CDT... At 521 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Council Grounds State Park, or 21 miles northwest of Wausau, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... New Wood Wildlife Area around 525 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
